languages.text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
languages.original_text: Уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}репутации{/g} Вольного Торговца дает Джай дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g}: -Друзианцы: +(уровень репутации) при любых {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверках на сопротивление{/g} +(2 × уровень репутации) к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знанию: Империум{/g}. -Эксплораторы: +(уровень репутации)% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +(2 × уровень репутации) к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Технике{/g}. -Миссия Касбаллики: +(уровень репутации)% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и +(2 × уровень репутации) к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерции{/g}. -Пустотное братство: +(уровень репутации)% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} и +(2 × уровень репутации) к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напору{/g}. -Имперский флот: +(уровень репутации)% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытий{/g} и +(2 × уровень репутации) к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's reputation level grants Jae additional bonuses: - Drusians: +(2 × reputation level) to all resistance tests and +(4 × reputation level) to Lore (Imperium) - Explorators: +(2 × reputation level)% to armour and +(4 × reputation level) to Tech-Use - Kasballica Mission: +(2 × reputation level)% to dodge and parry and +(4 × reputation level) to Commerce - Fellowship of the Void: +(2 × reputation level)% to critical hit chance and +(4 × reputation level) to Coercion - The Imperial Navy: +(2 × reputation level)% to cover efficiency and +(4 × reputation level) to Persuasion

The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

languages.text: 行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}等级会让婕伊获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果： - 德鲁苏斯教派：所有{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}结果获得（声望等级）加值，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}提高（2×声望等级）。 - 开拓者舰队：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高（声望等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}提高（2×声望等级）。 - 卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团：{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高（声望等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}提高（2×声望等级）。 - 虚空协联：{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高（声望等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}提高（2×声望等级）。 - 帝国海军：{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高（声望等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}提高（2×声望等级）。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}等级会让婕伊获得额外加成效果：{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} - 德鲁苏斯教派：所有抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}结果获得（2×声望等级）加值，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}提高（4×声望等级）。 - 开拓者舰队：{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}提高（2×声望等级），{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}提高（4×声望等级）。 - 卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团：{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高（2×声望等级），{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}提高（4×声望等级）。 - 虚空协联{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g}：暴击率提高（2×声望等级）{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g}%，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}提高（4×声望等级）。 - 帝国海军：{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高（2×声望等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}提高（4×声望等级）。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}評判{/g}レベルでジェイに追加{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が付与される： -- ドルスス教：{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗力判定{/g}に(2 ×評判レベル)と{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}に(4 ×評判レベル)が追加 - エクスプロレイター：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に(2 ×評判レベル)%と{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}に(4 ×評判レベル)が追加 - カスバリカ聖務団：{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に(2 ×評判レベル)%と{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}に(4 × 評判レベル)が追加 - ヴォイドの連帯：{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}に (2 ×評判レベル)%と{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}に(4 ×評判レベル)が追加 - 帝国海軍：{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}に(2 ×評判レベル%と{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}に(4 × 評判レベル)が追加
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}評判{/g}レベルでジェイに追加{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}付与： ・ドルスス教：抵抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}+(2 ×評判レベル)／{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}+(4 ×評判レベル) ・エクスプロレイター：{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}+(2 ×評判レベル)%／{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}+(4 ×評判レベル) ・カスバリカ聖務団：{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}+(2 ×評判レベル)%／{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}+(4 × 評判レベル) ・ヴォイドの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}：クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}+(2 ×評判レベル)%／{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}に+(4 ×評判レベル) ・帝国海軍：{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}+(2 ×評判レベル%／{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}+(4 × 評判レベル)

languages.text: Jae obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} adicionales según el nivel de {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputación{/g} del Comerciante Independiente: -Drusianos: +(nivel de reputación) a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} y +(2 × nivel de reputación) a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}. -Exploradores: +(nivel de reputación) % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y +(2 × nivel de reputación) a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Uso de tecnología{/g}. -Misión Kasballica: +(nivel de reputación) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y +(2 × nivel de reputación) a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}. -Hermandad del Vacío: +(nivel de reputación) % de probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} y +(2 × nivel de reputación) a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}. -La Armada Imperial: +(nivel de reputación) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} y +(2 × nivel de reputación) a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}Rufstufe{/g} des Freihändlers gewährt Jae zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}: -Drusianer: +(Rufstufe) auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} und +(2 × Rufstufe) auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}. -Entdecker: +(Rufstufe) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +(2 × Rufstufe) auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}. -Kasballica-Mission: +(Rufstufe) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und +(2 × Rufstufe) auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}. -Gefährten der Leere: +(Rufstufe) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} und +(2 × Rufstufe) auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}. -Die Imperiale Kriegsflotte: +(Rufstufe) % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} und +(2 × Rufstufe) auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

languages.text: Le niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}réputation{/g} {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} confère à Jae des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} supplémentaires : -Drusiens : +(niveau de réputation) pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) pour {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators : +(niveau de réputation) % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) à la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}. -Mission de la Kasballica : +(niveau de réputation) % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) au {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Communauté du Vide : +(niveau de réputation)% aux chances de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) à l'{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}. -Marine Impériale : +(niveau de réputation) % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de la couverture{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) à la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}réputation{/g} {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} confère à Jae des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} supplémentaires : -Drusiens : +(niveau de réputation) pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) pour {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators : +(niveau de réputation) % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) à la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}. -Mission de la Kasballica : +(niveau de réputation) % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) au {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Communauté du Vide : +(niveau de réputation)% aux chances de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) à l'{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}. -Marine Impériale : +(niveau de réputation) % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de la couverture{/g} et +(2 × niveau de réputation) à la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}itibar{/g} seviyesi, Jae'a ilave {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} kazandırır: -Drususçular: Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerine{/g} +(itibar seviyesi) ve {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g} yeteneğine +(2 × itibar seviyesi). -Keşiftörler: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Zırh{/g} değerine +%(itibar seviyesi) ve {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tekno Aşinalığı{/g} yeteneğine +(2 × itibar seviyesi). -Kasballica Misyonu: {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Kaçınma{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine +%(itibar seviyesi) ve {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}tecim{/g} yeteneğine +(2 × itibar seviyesi). -Uçsuz Kardeşliği: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritik vuruş{/g} olasılığı değerine +%(itibar seviyesi) ve {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g} yeteneğine +(2 × itibar seviyesi). -İmparatorluk Donanması: {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Siper etkililiği{/g} değerine +%(itibar seviyesi) ve {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}İkna{/g} yeteneğine +(2 × itibar seviyesi).
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputation{/g} level grants Jae additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -Drusians: +(reputation level) to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}. -Explorators: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}. -Kasballica Mission: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}. -Fellowship of the Void: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}. -The Imperial Navy: +(reputation level)% to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +(2 × reputation level) to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
